The Real Thing
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
The Real Thing or Real Thing may refer to:

Contents
"The Real Thing", an episode of the Australian TV series All Saints
"The Real Thing", an episode of the British TV series Lovejoy
"The Real Thing", a documentary by James Burke (science historian)
The Real Thing, a collection of humorous essays by Kurt Andersen
"The Real Thing", a short story by Alison Goodman
The Real Thing, an American jazz group fronted by Ray Santisi

p: "The Real Thing", by the Brothers Johnson from their 1981 album Winners
"The Real Thing", by Delbert McClinton
"The Real Thing", by Bo Bice
"The Real Thing", by Tina Britt
"The Real Thing", recorded by Christina Aguilera for Nashville
"The Real Thing", by Kenny Loggins song from Leap of Faith
"The Real Thing", by Kingston Wall from III – Tri-Logy
"The Real Thing", by Lords of Acid from Strange Days (Music from the Motion Picture)
"The Real Thing", by Warren Haynes from Live at Bonnaroo
"Real Thing", by Alice in Chains from Facelift
"Real Thing", by KMFDM from Hau Ruck
"Real Thing", by Pearl Jam and Cypress Hill from the Judgement Night film soundtrack
"Ain't Nothing Like the Real Thing", a song by Marvin Gaye and Tammi Terrell
"Even Better Than the Real Thing", a song by U2
"It's the Real Thing", a song by Angela Winbush
"It's the Real Thing", a Coca-Cola slogan
